about_the_game:
In **Legends of Aden**, you will step into an epic Western fantasy world filled with intense adventures like never before! Gather your loyal comrades and form a blood pact akin to the Fellowship of the Ring, standing together against the forces of darkness and seizing your rightful kingly glory. Here, every wild encounter is as thrilling as capturing the One Ring in Middle-earth, and every PvP duel ignites with endless bloodlust and passion!

On this mysterious continent, the open marketplace is player-driven, just like in a Middle-earth adventure, where wealth and power determine your fate. Fight alongside powerful allies, climb to the pinnacle of power, and establish your legendary kingdom in this world full of opportunities and dangers!

Danger and wealth coexist here, opportunities and challenges intertwine. Just as Frodo was entrusted with the mission of destroying the One Ring, you too will shoulder the responsibility of ruling this continent. Join **Legends of Aden** now, use your wisdom and courage to amass wealth, forge alliances, and write your heroic epic in this fantasy world! Let your name become a legendary tale known throughout the land!

We are creating an MMORPG game that inherits the classic style of the Korean **"L"** series, specifically designed for a group of players with certain preferences. If you're not familiar with or interested in these types of games (such as **Legend**, **L.M**, or **L.W**), we advise caution before trying, as this game may feel somewhat monotonous and comes with a certain pay-to-win pressure. However, for loyal players of NC, this game will rekindle your passion and satisfaction for the classics. We've specially designed it with extremely high drop rates and synthesis rates, allowing you to reap abundant rewards in the game, enjoy a stronger sense of achievement, and experience its true value.

**【Unlimited Transformations, Unlimited Power, Lightning-fast Attack Speed, Become the Ultimate Overlord】**

In **Legends of Aden**, you have hundreds of transformations to choose from! Whether transforming into a sexy, fierce Dark Elf, a dual-gun mercenary, or a death-bringing Dark Lord, you'll not only gain a cool appearance but also enjoy speed boosts and a surge in combat power. Every transformation is a game-changer, a moment to turn the tide. Become the ultimate adventurer, feel the thrill of slaying enemies, and reap the spoils of war, becoming the symbol of wealth and power overnight. With every strike, leave a trail of bones in your wake.

**【Global Server, Blood Pact Battles, Hold the Line Till the Last Second, Fight Till the Very End】**

Players from around the world gather, with only one ultimate goal — to become the strongest. Summon your loyal comrades, join forces to slay the ultimate BOSS, and fight for wealth and glory under the banner of your blood pact. Lead your blood pact members in wars, plunder others' territories, and occupy fortified strongholds. In the epic global server battles, every fight is filled with bloodlust and passion. Courage and wisdom will be your strongest buffs, becoming a fearless adventurer who is not afraid of the blood and tears of war. Stand with your companions to stir up a storm and dominate the land!

**【Wield a +10 Divine Weapon, Instantly Annihilate All Strong Foes】**

Still troubled by the difficulty of obtaining divine gear? In **Legends of Aden**, this will no longer be an issue. Easily acquire material scrolls and forge powerful divine gear, with the thrill of upgrading and enchanting. Say goodbye to mediocre weapons; the +10 divine weapon you forge yourself will make you unstoppable, leading to victory and writing your legendary chapter.

**【Built-in Auto Mode, Grow Stronger Every Moment】**

Free your hands and grow stronger with ease! The game introduces a unique auto mode, breaking away from the tedious grind, allowing you to effortlessly collect materials, gold, and experience. Farming mobs and forging artifacts have never been easier. No longer worry about falling behind in leveling; activate the auto mode, and every second you'll level up, effortlessly surpassing others!

**【Every Inch is a Battlefield, Watch Your Back, Kill Anytime】**

In the desolate, blood-soaked wilderness and bone-laden graveyards, this vast world is filled with murderous intent. A slight misstep, and the enemy might strike from behind, taking your life in one blow. To survive in this brutal dark continent, you must become stronger and more invincible. Grip your weapon tightly, stay vigilant, and prepare for one battle after another, ready to unleash a massacre at any moment!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may not be suitable for all ages, or may not be appropriate to access during work hours: it contains general mature content, frequent occurrences of fantasy violence, bloodshed, or killing.

  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 580(8GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (6 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Legends of Aden is a Western fantasy style MMORPG featuring intense monster battles and treasure hunts, clan assemblies, field bosses, and thrilling PvP combat. With an open trading system driven by players, danger and opportunity coexist. Come gather wealth, make allies, and dominate the realm.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
